setPasscode.passcodeHint: Before continue, you must set up a passcode to secure your device

createAccount.enterPinHint: Enter a PIN to secure this account. The PIN is used to verify actions made with your account.
createAccount.howToGenerate: Move your finger across the area to create a random seed.
createAccount.notePassphraseHint: Note down your passphrase. The passphrase is the master key to your account. Therefore, keep your passphrase always safe and private!
createAccount.notePassphraseHint2: We don't store passphrase even on your device, so we can't recover access to account. Note it!
createAccount.title: Create account

importAccount.activeAccountHint: Active accounts are used for making BURST transactions. Requires user generate a passphrase or provide one. Requires a user create a PIN for transactions. The passphrase is only used once locally to encrypt your private key; it is not stored anywhere.
importAccount.passiveAccountHint: Passive accounts are useful if you know a BURST address, but don't intend on making any transactions. Adds increased security. Can be converted to an active account at any time.
importAccount.title: Import account
